metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45059 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Varnish Cache 7.x before 7.1.2 and 7.2.x before7.2.1. A request smuggling attack can be performed on Varnish Cache serversby requesting that certain headers are made hop-by-hop, preventing theVarnish Cache servers from forwarding critical headers to the backend.

criterions.comment: varnish package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
